EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - Columbus
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io>
<http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/columbus>
Join Pivotal technologists and learn how to build and deploy great software on a modern cloud platform.
At this workshop, you’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal’s CF platform. In just a few hours, you’ll realize the speed and ease of pushing an application on Pivotal CF.
Who Should Attend The workshops cover topics of interest to developers, architects, operations and technical managers. The keynotes set the stage for the workshops and will provide valuable insights for all.
AGENDA
8:00 AM – 9:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM – 10:00 AM Keynote: Software Kept Eating the World
10:00 AM – 10:10 AM Coffee Break
10:10 AM – 11:15 AM Session #1: The Developer Experience
11:15 AM – 11:30 AM Coffee Break
11:30 AM – 12:30 PM Session #2 - Architecture & Operations
12:30 PM – 2:00 PM Lunch & Afternoon Keynote: Continuous Delivery & Microservices
2:00 PM – 2:15 PM Coffee Break
2:15 PM – 4:00 PM Session #3 - Enabling Continuous Delivery
4:00 PM Wrap Up & End of Day
Register <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/columbus> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited.
THURSDAY March 12, 2015 Renaissance Columbus Downtown Hotel 50 North Third Street Columbus, OH 43215 (614) 228-5050
